title: r/AmITheA**hole My Spouse Wants Me To Throw Away My Anime Pillow, But I REFUSE!
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's story, OP and her husband use a body pillow named DMZ-chan to keep the peace in the bedroom at night when they sleep. When her mother-in-law sees the body pillow, OP's husband immediately starts pressuring OP to get rid of the body pillow, but OP refuses! The body pillow saved their marriage! How could she betray DMZ-chan like that?
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
